column6:
Quiet street, neat neighborhood near bus/train service to downtown, hospitals, conventions, sports. Equidistant to both airports. 
View onto tranquil garden area. Full kitchen and basic cable.

The light rail is 1/2 block from the apartment, 3 minute walk. 
 We are at the LINDALE PARK stop.
See this link for a map of the lines, present and proposed:
